attributes.action: Call a general election to take place in October 2008
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Given that we have a prime minister that was never elected to power by the people; the current government has lost touch with the people; no longer listens to the people and is no longer a democracy for the people; broke its promise about providing the people with a choice on the EU treaty; lost control of Britains borders; gives more rights to criminals instead of British law abiding citizens; is taxing the British public too much; is invading British citizens personal lives too much and eroding civil liberties in a dictatorial fashion; is in it for themselves and not for the people; has just ratified a treaty relinquishing powers and vetoes without the British publics say so; has made politically correct decisions that any normal person would just dismiss, and finally anything else that is missing which is just obvious to normal people, it is high time a general election was held so the people of Britain can decide if they still want a government to make decisions for them without listening to what they really want and probably know is better for them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
